alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 5:56PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Otero, southwestern Crowley and east central Pueblo Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 555 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Avondale, or 15 miles southeast of Pueblo Airport, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Otero, southwestern Crowley and east central Pueblo Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
